attributes.action: alllow dogs on leads at all times in Topsham, Exeter, England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Small and big dogs should be on leads to protect vulnerable people and to control them more easily. In Exeter its the law to put leads on the dogs and if you get caught, you will be fined.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
